1.0.0.en:
*!!!BREAKING CHANGE!!!**

added options for external MQTT-Server
connection to zigbe2mqtt completely reworked and changed to MQTT
lots of bugfixes
automatically set button actions back to false
added support for Zigbee2MQTT feature simulated_brightness
added config check
added log output about coordinator details

*! BREAKING CHANGE*

weitere Optionen für externen MQTT-Server

много багфиксов

добавлена поддержка функции Zigbee2MQTT simulated_brightness
